caption: Viking
infobox-image: Viking Orbiter releasing the lander.jpg | Artist impression of a Viking orbiter releasing a lander descent capsule

Specifications.Power: Orbiters: 620 watts (solar array) | Lander: 70 watts (two RTG units)
Specifications.Design life: Orbiters: 4 years at Mars | Landers: 4-6 years at Mars

Production.Retired: Viking 1 | orbiter | August 17, 1980 | Viking 1 | lander | July 20, 1976 (landing) to November 13, 1982 | Viking 2 | orbiter | July 25, 1978 | Viking 2 | lander | September 3, 1976 (landing) to April 11, 1980
